trans-unit.source: Wraps an XSD <xref uid="langword_csharp_gDay" name="gDay" href=""></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: Encapsula um XSD <xref uid="langword_csharp_gDay" name="gDay" href=""> </xref> tipo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about XSD data types, see "XML Data Types Reference" in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre tipos de dados XSD, consulte "Referência de tipos do XML dados" na biblioteca MSDN em http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDay"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDay"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDay"></xref> class with a specified <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDay"> </xref> classe com um especificado <xref:System.DateTime>objeto.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object to initialize the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.DateTime>objeto para inicializar a instância atual.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a linguagem de definição de esquema XML (XSD) do tipo SOAP atual.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that indicates the XSD of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que indica o XSD do tipo SOAP atual.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <xref:System.String> into a <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDay"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Converte especificado <xref:System.String>em uma <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDay"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The Parse method is capable of parsing strings in various formats.
trans-unit.target: O método Parse é capaz de analisar cadeias de caracteres em vários formatos.

trans-unit.source: The recognizable string formats are "---ddzzz" and "---dd", which are composed out of the following format patterns.
trans-unit.target: Os formatos de cadeia de caracteres reconhecível são "---ddzzz" e "---dd", que é composto por padrões de formato a seguir.

trans-unit.source: |Format Pattern|Description|Examples| |--------------------|-----------------|--------------| |dd|The day of the month.
Single-digit days have a leading zero.|23, 09| |zzz|The full time zone offset (hour and minutes) from the Universal Time Coordinate (Greenwich Mean Time).
trans-unit.target: Dias de um único dígito têm um zero à esquerda. | 23, 09 | | zzz | O completo deslocamento de fuso horário (hora e minutos) de Universal Time Coordinate (hora de Greenwich).

trans-unit.source: Single-digit hours have a leading zero.
trans-unit.target: Horas de dígito têm um zero à esquerda.

trans-unit.source: "Z" means the current time zone.|-07:00, +08:00, Z|
trans-unit.target: "Z" significa que o fuso horário atual. | -07:00, +08:&00;, Z |

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> to convert.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.String>para converter.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A object that is obtained from value.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que é obtido do value .

trans-unit.source: value does not contain a date and time that corresponds to any of the recognized format patterns.
trans-unit.target: valuenão contém uma data e hora que corresponde a qualquer um dos padrões de formato reconhecido.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDay.Value*> as a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDay.Value*>como <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDay.Value*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> obtained from <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDay.Value*> in the format "---dd".
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>obtido <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDay.Value*>no formato "---dd".</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapDay.Value*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the date and time of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a data e hora da instância atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> object that contains the date and time of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DateTime>objeto que contém a data e hora da instância atual.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a linguagem de definição de esquema XML (XSD) do tipo SOAP atual.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that indicates the XSD of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que indica o XSD do tipo SOAP atual.</xref:System.String>
